name: Dancer
description: When someone begins to dance, this Pokemon dances to. It expresses its feelings and communicates through little jigs.
effect: Whenever a Pokemon uses a Move with the word “Dance” (i.e. Dragon Dance, Petal Dance etc.), Aqua Step, or Clangorous Soul, the User gets a free action to use the same Move immediately after and succeeds automatically. (Damage must be rolled)
